remark.p: Foreign Service Officer, U.S. Mission to NATO, from October 1974 until January 1975; Foreign Service Inspector, Department of State, from January 1975 until April 1975; Director of Argentina-Paraguay-Uruguay Affairs, Bureau of Inter-American Affairs, Department of State, from April 1975 until July 1976; Deputy Chief of Mission-Counselor at the U.S. Embassy in Tegucigalpa from July 1976
